title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who founded the Indian National Congress?
explanation: ✅ A.O. Hume founded INC in 1885.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: When did the Jallianwala Bagh massacre take place?
explanation: ✅ It occurred on 13 April 1919 in Amritsar.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the first Governor-General of Bengal?
explanation: ✅ Warren Hastings was the first Governor-General.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Quit India Movement' was launched in which year?
explanation: ✅ Launched in 1942 with 'Do or Die' slogan.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who is known as the 'Iron Man of India'?
explanation: ✅ Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel is the Iron Man of India.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who said 'Swaraj is my birthright and I shall have it'?
explanation: ✅ Bal Gangadhar Tilak gave this slogan.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the founder of 'Brahmo Samaj'?
explanation: ✅ Founded by Raja Ram Mohan Roy in 1828.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The partition of Bengal (1905) was done by?
explanation: ✅ Partitioned by Lord Curzon.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who wrote the book 'Discovery of India'?
explanation: ✅ Written by J.L. Nehru in Ahmednagar Fort.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Where did Gandhi Ji start his first Satyagraha in India?
explanation: ✅ Start in Champaran (1917).

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The Indus Valley Civilization was discovered in which year?
explanation: ✅ Discovered in 1921 by Dayaram Sahni (Harappa).

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which site of IVC is known as the 'Mound of the Dead'?
explanation: ✅ Mohenjodaro literally means 'Mound of the Dead' in Sindhi.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Great Bath' was found at which site?
explanation: ✅ The Great Bath is a famous structure at Mohenjodaro.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which IVC site had a man-made dockyard?
explanation: ✅ Lothal (Gujarat) had a massive brick dockyard.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Evidence of a ploughed field was found at?
explanation: ✅ Kalibangan (Rajasthan) shows evidence of ploughed fields.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which metal was NOT known to the Indus Valley people?
explanation: ✅ Iron was not known; it was a Bronze Age civilization.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The famous 'Dancing Girl' statue is made of?
explanation: ✅ It is a masterpiece of bronze casting (lost-wax technique).

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which was the only city without a citadel (fortified area)?
explanation: ✅ Chanhudaro was an industrial town without a citadel.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The Indus Valley Civilization script was?
explanation: ✅ The script is pictographic and not yet deciphered.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which animal is most frequently depicted on IVC seals?
explanation: ✅ The mystical 'Unicorn' is the most common motif.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Dholavira is famous for its unique?
explanation: ✅ Dholavira had an advanced system of reservoirs and dams.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Who discovered the site of Mohenjodaro?
explanation: ✅ R.D. Banerji discovered Mohenjodaro in 1922.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The main crop of the Indus Valley people was?
explanation: ✅ Wheat and Barley were the staple food crops.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which site provides evidence of a 'Double Burial'?
explanation: ✅ Lothal has graves with male and female skeletons together.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Pashupati Seal' depicts a figure surrounded by?
explanation: ✅ Surrounded by Elephant

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: At which site were bones of a horse found (controversial)?
explanation: ✅ Surkotada (Gujarat) yielded horse remains.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Harappa is located on the banks of which river?
explanation: ✅ Harappa is situated on the left bank of the Ravi river.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Mohenjodaro is located on the banks of which river?
explanation: ✅ Mohenjodaro is on the banks of the Indus river.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The largest Indus Valley site in India is?
explanation: ✅ Rakhigarhi (Haryana) is the largest site in India.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which material was commonly used to make seals?
explanation: ✅ Steatite (soft stone) was the standard material for seals.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Evidence of a 'Bead Factory' was found at?
explanation: ✅ Chanhudaro and Lothal were centers for bead making.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The town planning of IVC was based on?
explanation: ✅ Streets cut each other at 90 degrees (Grid System).

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Bearded Priest' bust was found at?
explanation: ✅ The stone bust was found at Mohenjodaro.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which site yielded the evidence of 'Fire Altars'?
explanation: ✅ Fire altars suggest ritualistic practices at Kalibangan.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Rice husk has been found at which site?
explanation: ✅ Evidence of rice is found at Lothal and Rangpur.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The easternmost site of the IVC is?
explanation: ✅ Alamgirpur (UP) is the eastern limit.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The northernmost site of the IVC is?
explanation: ✅ Manda (J&K) is the northernmost site.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the Director-General of ASI when IVC was discovered?
explanation: ✅ Sir John Marshall announced the discovery to the world.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The ratio of Indus Valley bricks was typically?
explanation: ✅ The standard dimension ratio was 1:2:4.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which site shows a 'Signboard' with 10 large letters?
explanation: ✅ A unique giant inscription was found at Dholavira.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Banawali (Haryana) is famous for?
explanation: ✅ A terracotta model of a plough was found here.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The Indus Valley people traded with which civilization?
explanation: ✅ Extensive trade with Mesopotamia (called Meluha).

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which bird was considered sacred in IVC?
explanation: ✅ Pigeons and doves were likely revered.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The term 'Meluha' in Mesopotamian texts refers to?
explanation: ✅ Meluha was the ancient name for the Indus region.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Indus Valley houses were mainly built of?
explanation: ✅ Uniform burnt bricks were a distinct feature.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: Which site revealed a skeleton with a copper mirror?
explanation: ✅ Found in Cemetery R-37 at Harappa.

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History
question: The swastika symbol likely originated from?

title: Indus Valley Civil. Set-1
subject: History

explanation: ✅ Kalibangan (Rajasthan) is on the ancient Ghaggar/Saraswati.

subject: History
question: Polychrome pottery (multi-colored) was?

subject: History
question: The 'Great Granary' at Harappa consists of how many blocks?
explanation: ✅ It has 12 units arranged in two rows of six.

question: Sutkagendor is located in?
explanation: ✅ It is a coastal site in Balochistan (Pakistan).

explanation: ✅ The earliest evidence of an earthquake is at Kalibangan.

question: Pot burials (Coffin burials) were common at?
explanation: ✅ Harappa (Cemetery H & R-37) shows distinct burial types.

subject: History
question: The script was written from?
explanation: ✅ Right to left

explanation: ✅ Vishnu worship began in the Vedic/Later Vedic period.
